nushi_hikou_030_friend_02:
Looks like we don’t have to worry about any
more boulders falling on us now, huh?[VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_hikou_030_friend_05:
There has to be more of that Herba Mystica it
ate in here.[VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_hikou_030_friend_06:
Let’s hurry and find it before the Titan can come
back for another go at us![VAR 0114(0006)]
